Title: Throne of Blood
Writer: Hideo Oguni (screenplay), Shinobu Hashimoto (screenplay), Ryûzô Kikushima (screenplay), Akira Kurosawa (screenplay)
Actors: Toshirô Mifune, Isuzu Yamada, Takashi Shimura, Akira Kubo
Plot: A war-hardened general, egged on by his ambitious wife, works to fulfill a prophecy that he would become lord of Spider's Web Castle.
